ygData.subject: Fun with Fireworks
ygData.msgSnippet: Last night I headed over to Felwithe and fetched a handful of Bat Wings. I was suprised that I got a set of 4 rockets back. I sparked off the first saw a red
ygData.messageBody:
Last night I headed over to Felwithe and fetched
a handful of Bat Wings.

I was suprised that I got a set of 4 rockets back.
I sparked off the first saw a red flare and thought 'cool'.
Hit it again, nothing. /shrug.

Tried another one, this time Green, alright.
Right Click "ah", 1 charge I got it...
I'll try outside ontop of a hill and futz around
with firing angle, but for a first experience, it's
still a novelty item.

So if Rod & Wing + FireWater for fuel,
can an empty rocket be recharged?

My toolbox is full of the 8 others I made,
so I didn't have room to try reloading 'em.

Will search the Archives here, but figured I'd ask anew.

BizzleBob [Veeshan]
